 A nested modus ponens deduction.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2005.) (Proof shortened by O'Cat, 15-Jan-2008.)
statement:
mpdi.1 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
mpdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ( ch -> th ) ) ) $.
mpdi $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
